jml.clustering
Class L1NMF

java.lang.Object
  jml.clustering.Clustering
      jml.clustering.L1NMF
Direct Known Subclasses:
NMF
public class L1NMF
extends Clustering

A Java implementation for L1NMF which solves the following optimization problem:

min || X - G * F ||_F^2 + gamma * ||F||_{sav} + nu * ||G||_{sav}
s.t. G >= 0, F >= 0

Version:
1.0, Jan. 3rd, 2013
Author:
Mingjie Qian
